stories.text:
Sandbox Banking (YC W17)| Software Engineers | Full-Time | Remote |

https://sandboxbanking.com/careers/ Sandbox provides a universal adapter for banks and Banking as a Service (BaaS) infrastructure. We help institutions quickly and securely integrate new software from vendors and fintechs. We are growing quickly, YC backed, and possess an enviable runway. Our team is looking to hire exceptional individuals for the following:

Solution Delivery Engineer (https://sandboxbanking.com/2021/04/30/solution-delivery-software-engineer/) Will scope requirements, develop, test and deploy specific customer integrations using our Glyue platform

Platform Software Engineer ( https://sandboxbanking.com/2021/04/30/platform-software-engineer/) Will help build/extend our core SaaS product (Glyue). Our stack is comprised of Vue/JS/HTML/CSS, Python, Django, Postgres, Docker, Terraform, and an assortment of AWS services.

Senior Platform Software Engineer (https://sandboxbanking.com/2021/04/30/senior-platform-software-engineer/ ) Successful candidates will fulfill the requirements of our Platform Software Engineer role and also possess technical leadership, software architecture design, and devops abilities. A minimum of 4 years of professional experience is required.

Solution Delivery Infrastructure Engineer (https://sandboxbanking.com/2021/06/11/solution-delivery-infrastructure-engineer/) Will be responsible for quickly delivering, managing, and monitoring the infrastructure and network resources necessary to delight our customers DevOps, aws, ec2, rds, route53, ansible, terraform, openvpn, ipsec experience helpful
stories.title: Sandbox Banking (YC17) is hiring infrastructure and software engineers
